import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';
import { Router } from '@angular/router';
import { TokenService } from 'src/app/services/token.service';
import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service';
import Swal from 'sweetalert2';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-signup',
  templateUrl: './sign-up.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./sign-up.component.scss']
})
export class SignUpComponent implements OnInit {


  constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder, private userService: UserService, private router: Router, private tokenService: TokenService) { }
  public signUpForm: FormGroup;
  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.createForm();
    if (this.tokenService.getToken() != null) {
      this.signUpForm.reset();
      this.router.navigateByUrl('/anime');
    }
  }


  createForm() {
    this.signUpForm = this.formBuilder.group({
      username: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6), Validators.maxLength(10)]],
      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],
      password: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8), Validators.maxLength(15), Validators.pattern('(?=.*?[A-Z])(?=.*?[a-z])(?=.*?[0-9])(?=.*?[#?!@$%^&*-.]).{8,}$')]],
      cpassword: ['', [Validators.required, ]]}/* , this.pwdMatchValidator */
    );
  }
  get username() {
    return this.signUpForm.get('username')
  }
  get email() {
    return this.signUpForm.get('email')
  }
  get password() {
    return this.signUpForm.get('password')
  }
  get cpassword() {
    return this.signUpForm.get('cpassword')
  }

  validationMessages = {
    'username': [
      { type: 'required', message: 'Field "Username" is required.' },
      { type: 'minlength', message: 'Field "Username" must be at least 6 characters long.' },
      { type: 'maxlength', message: 'Field "Username" must contain less than 10 characters.' },
    ],
    'email': [
      { type: 'required', message: 'Field "E-mail" is required.' },
      { type: 'email', message: 'Field "E-mail" must include the character "@".' }
    ],
    'password': [
      { type: 'required', message: 'Field "Password" is required.' },
      {type: 'pattern', message: 'Field "Password" must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one special character.'},
      { type: 'maxlength', message: 'Field "Password" must contain less than 15 characters.' },
    ],
    'cpassword': [
      { type: 'required', message: 'Passwords must match' },
    ]
  }

 /*  
    TODO: AÑADIR MÉTODOS A DOCUMENTACIÓN

 MustMatch(password: string, confirmPassword: string) {
    (formGroup: FormGroup) => {
      const control = formGroup.controls[password];
      const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[confirmPassword];
      if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors.mustMatch) {
        return;
      }
      if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {
        matchingControl.setErrors({ mustMatch: true });
        Swal.fire(
          'Passwords does not match.'
        )
      } else {
        matchingControl.setErrors(null);
      }
    }

  } */
/*   pwdMatchValidator(frm: FormGroup) {
    return frm.get('password').value === frm.get('cpassword').value
       ? null : {'mismatch': true};
 } */

  signUp() {
    if (this.signUpForm.invalid) return
    if (this.password.value !== this.cpassword.value) {
      Swal.fire(
        'Passwords must match'
      )
      return
    }
    const data = this.signUpForm.value;
    this.userService.signUp(data).subscribe(resp => {
      Swal.fire(
        resp.message,
      ).then(() => {
        this.router.navigateByUrl("/home");
      })
    }, error => {
      Swal.fire(
        error.message,
      )
    })
  }
}

<html>
<body>
	<div class="container h-100">
		<div class="d-flex justify-content-center h-100">
			<div class="user_card">
				<div class="d-flex justify-content-center">
					<div class="brand_logo_container">
						<img src="../../../assets/axolotl.png" class="brand_logo" alt="Logo">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="d-flex justify-content-center form_container">
					<form [formGroup]="signUpForm" (ngSubmit)="signUp()">
						<div class="input-group mb-5">
							<div class="input-group-append">
								<span class="input-group-text"><i class="fas fa-user"></i></span>
							</div>
							<input type="text" formControlName="username" class="form-control input_user" value="" placeholder="Username">
						</div>
						<span *ngFor="let error of validationMessages.username">
                            <ng-container *ngIf="username.hasError(error.type) && username.touched">
                                <small class="errorMessage">{{error.message}}</small>
                            </ng-container>
                        </span>
						<div class="input-group mb-5">
							<div class="input-group-append">
								<span class="input-group-text"><i class="fas fa-envelope"></i></span>
							</div>
							<input type="mail" formControlName="email" class="form-control input_pass" value="" placeholder="E-mail">
						</div>
						<span *ngFor="let error of validationMessages.email">
                            <ng-container *ngIf="email.hasError(error.type) && email.touched">
                                <small class="errorMessage">{{error.message}}</small>
                            </ng-container>
                        </span>
						<div class="input-group mb-5">
							<div class="input-group-append">
								<span class="input-group-text"><i class="fas fa-key"></i></span>
							</div>
							<input type="password" formControlName="password" class="form-control input_pass" value="" placeholder="Password">
						</div>
						<span *ngFor="let error of validationMessages.password">
                            <ng-container *ngIf="password.hasError(error.type) && password.touched">
                                <small class="errorMessage">{{error.message}}</small>
                            </ng-container>
                        </span>
						<div class="input-group mb-5">
							<div class="input-group-append">
								<span class="input-group-text"><i class="fas fa-key"></i></span>
							</div>
							<input type="password" formControlName="cpassword" class="form-control input_pass" value="" placeholder="Confirm password">
						</div>
						<span *ngFor="let error of validationMessages.cpassword">
                            <ng-container *ngIf="cpassword.hasError(error.type) && cpassword.touched">
                                <small class="errorMessage">{{error.message}}</small>
                            </ng-container>
                        </span>
							<div class="d-flex justify-content-center mt-3 login_container">
				 	<button type="submit" name="button" class="btn login_btn">Sign Up</button>
				   </div>
					</form>
				</div>
		
				<div class="mt-3 mb-3">
					<div class="d-flex justify-content-center links">
						Already have an account?<a routerLink="/signin" class="signin ml-2">Sign In</a>
					</div>
					<div class="d-flex justify-content-center links">
						Don't want to join us? <a routerLink="/anime" class=" signin ml-2">Enter without credentials</a>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</body>
</html>

        width: 400px;
        margin-top: auto !important;

        position: relative;

        justify-content: center;

    }
